DOC.criteria: TMD diagnose subject RDC / TMD confirm MRI finding , anterior disk displacement without reduction , full dentition ( exclude third molar ) . Subjects diagnose TMD exclusively muscular ; posterior / medial displacement disc ; show systemic disease affect joint / masticatory muscle ; neuromuscular disease ; hypo / condylar hyperplasia ; make use type dental prosthesis ; orthodontic / physical therapy ; show neurological behavioral disorder preclude achievement MRI and/or history previous TMJ surgery .
